message_1: How many different 7-letter words can be formed using the letters in the word "MATHISFUN", with each letter appearing exactly once?
message_2:
The word "MATHISFUN" has 9 unique letters. To form a 7-letter word using these letters, we need to choose 7 letters out of the 9 available. This can be done in 9C7 ways, where "C" denotes the number of combinations.

9C7 = 9! / (7! * (9-7)!)
= 9! / (7! * 2!)
= (9 * 8 * 7!)/(7! * 2)
= (9 * 8)/2
= 36

So, there are 36 different 7-letter words that can be formed using the letters in the word "MATHISFUN" with each letter appearing exactly once.
